com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.GameDirector.Statistic

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.GameDirector.Statistic.Statistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatisticsInfo, StatisticsInput

    public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatisticsInfo, StatisticsInput
    class that register statistics about imte passed, the stress level in the current time, as a fucntion of number of hero movements on X and Y axis and registers current number of enemies in monitored level

    • Constructor Detail

      • Statistics

        public Statistics(double jumpFrequencyScaler,
                  double movementFrequencyScaler,
                  double timeMemory)
        constructor
        Parameters:
        jumpFrequencyScaler - if number is high, more calls to method registerJump produce less stress
        movementFrequencyScaler - if number is high, more calls to method registerMovement produce less stress
        timeMemory - number of seconds before jumps and movement are forgotten (all jumps and movements are timestamped)

        public void update(float deltaT)
        specific pollOrientation method for statistics. updates internal time and deletes movement and jumps that are too old
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        deltaT - tiem in seconds

        public double getStressLevel()
        Returns the stress level as determined by this statistics object, as a function of input.
        Specified by:
        getStressLevel in interface StatisticsInfo
        Returns:
